description: The initiative is a family-run hotel established in 2010, located in Bucaramanga, Colombia. It began as a recreational farm and evolved into a sustainable lodging facility focused on environmental protection and renewable energy. The hotel operates on a zero-waste model, utilizing solar energy and rainwater collection. It serves as an educational hub for visitors, promoting eco-friendly practices and self-sufficiency through organic gardening and composting, while fostering community engagement and awareness about sustainability.
name: Hotel Ecoturistico Villa Lucy
